name: bffdotfm-app-home
description: BFF.FM is a community radio station based in San Francisco, CA. This is the home screen widget for our app.
author: Ben Ward

scripts.build:css: mkdir -p dist/resources/css && postcss -c conf/ -o dist/resources/css/bff.css src/css/index.css -m
scripts.build: npm run build:html && npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run build:assets && npm run build:metadata
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:js
